qlvl.specutils package¶

Submodules¶

qlvl.specutils.deputils module¶

qlvl.specutils.deputils.draw_labels(gx, v_labels=None, e_labels=None)¶
qlvl.specutils.deputils.draw_match(feature, idx=0, figsize=(5.0, 5.0))¶
qlvl.specutils.deputils.draw_tree(gx, v_label=None, e_label=None, figsize=(5.0, 5.0))¶

Draw a tree layout of a graph Parameters ———- gx : networkx.DiGraph v_label : str e_label : str figsize : tuple of two values

qlvl.specutils.deputils.get_depth(gx)¶

Get the depth of a tree

qlvl.specutils.deputils.get_root(gx)¶

Get the root of a tree

qlvl.specutils.deputils.parse_pattern(target, feature, larrow='<-', rarrow='->')¶

Parse a string of feature regex to a node dict and an edge dict. e.g target = ‘(w+)/(N)w*’, feature = ‘<(nsubj) w+/(V)w* >[(acomp) (w+)/(JJ)]’ ==>

qlvl.specutils.deputils.tree_match(sentence, macro)¶

Match the sentence with the subgraph pattern. Abstract of the matching:

  • find root node of the pattern

  • iterate over each sentence node that matches the pattern root

  • recursively match the sentence with the pattern from each matched node

sentence : SentenceGraph macro : MacroGraph

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc module¶

Calculations of Matrices

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_association(freqMTX, nfreq=None, cfreq=None, meas='ppmi')¶

Compute association measures matrix.

freqMTXTypeTokenMatrix

Raw co-occurrence frequency matrix.

nfreqVocab

Node frequency (sum).

cfreqVocab

Collocate frequency (sum).

measstr

Implemented association measures: ‘pmi’, ‘ppmi’, ‘llik’ (log likelihood), ‘chisq’, ‘zscore’, ‘dice’.

association measure matrix : TypeTokenMatrix

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_cosine(measMTX, axis=0)¶

measMTX : TypeTokenMatrix

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_distance(measMTX, axis=0, metric='cosine')¶

Compute distance matrix from association measure matrix

measMTX : TypeTokenMatrix axis : int

0 (row) or 1 (column)

metricstr

‘cosine’ (default), ‘euclidean’, ‘cityblock’, ‘l1’, ‘l2’, ‘manhattan’ metrics that are valid in sklearn.metrics.pairwise_distances

TypeTokenMatrix

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_ppmi(freqMTX, nfreq=None, cfreq=None, positive=True)¶

This method is faster than compute_association(). Set positive to False to get pmi values.

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_simrank(simMTX, reverse=False)¶

Compute similarity rank matrix.

simMTX : cosine similarity SquareMatrix reverse : boolean, default False

True: the rank 1 represents the most similar one of that row False the largest rank 1 represents the most similar one of that row

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_token_vectors(tcWeightMTX, soccMTX, operation='addition', normalization='l1')¶

Compute token vectors. Build token vectors from a token weights (token-by-context weight matrix) and a second order matrix.

tcWeightMTXTypeTokenMatrix

Token-Context weight matrix.

soccMTXTypeTokenMatrix

Second order collocate matrix.

operationstr

‘addition’, ‘multiplication’,’weightedmean’

normalization: str

‘l1’, ‘l2’, ‘no’

token vectors : TypeTokenMatrix

Values for “normalization” are regulated by sklearn.preprocessing.normalize()

qlvl.specutils.mxcalc.compute_token_weights(tcPositionMTX, twMTX)¶

Compute token-by-context weight matrix. Build token weights from a token-by-context position/boolean matrix and a type-by-context weight matrix.

tcPositionMTXTypeTokenMatrix
token-by-context position matrix

target words

|
tokens | |
| —————
twMTXTypeTokenMatrix
type-by-context weight matrix, i.e. ‘ppmi’ (transposed)

target words

context | … |

features | … x … |
(types) | … |

token weight matrix : TypeTokenMatrix

This function will transform all explicit zeros in type-by-context weight matrix to implicit zeros. So, if those explicit zeros a important, be careful of them.

qlvl.specutils.mxutils module¶

qlvl.specutils.mxutils.merge_matrices(matrices)¶

Merge a list of (TypeTokenMatrix) matrices into one.

matriceslist

A list of matrices (TypeTokenMatrix)

tuple :

spmatrix, row_items, col_items

qlvl.specutils.mxutils.merge_two_matrices(mtx1, mtx2)¶

Merge two (TypeTokenMatrix) matrices.

mtx1 : TypeTokenMatrix mtx2 : TypeTokenMatrix

merged matrix : TypeTokenMatrix

qlvl.specutils.mxutils.transform_dict_to_spmatrix(dict_mtx, rowid2item, colid2item, verbose=False)¶

Generate sparse.csr_matrix from dict of dict, according to row item to id and col item to id mappings

dict_mtxdict of dict

Matrix represented by a Python dict of dict

rowid2itemlist of str

Alphabetically ascending sorted list of items

colid2itemlist of str

Alphabetically ascending sorted list of items

verbose : bool

sparse.csr_matrix

qlvl.specutils.mxutils.transform_indices(mtx, new_col_items)¶
qlvl.specutils.mxutils.transform_nodes_to_matrix(type2toks)¶

Transform type nodes to token matrix.

type2toksdict or iterable

Type string -> token nodes of this type

tokmx : TypeTokenMatrix

qlvl.specutils.mxutils.transform_spmatrix_to_dict(spmatrix, rowid2item, colid2item, verbose=False)¶

Generate dict of dict from sparse.csr_matrix, according to row item to id and col item to id mappings

spmatrix : csr_matrix rowid2item : iterable (of str)

Alphabetically ascending sorted list of items

colid2itemiterable (of str)

Alphabetically ascending sorted list of items

verbose : bool

Python dict of dict
